title: Gram Panchyat must have levied property tax on the building and authorised area shall be taken from the said property tax bill
clause_text: Gram Panchyat must have levied property tax on the building and authorised area shall be taken from the said property tax bill. If the owner constructs the housing for EWS / LIG in the form of tenements of size up to 50 sq.m.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Gram Panchyat must have levied property tax on the building and authorised area shall be taken from the said property tax bill.
